pullRequest.title: Remove dependency of hono-client-adapter on hono-client

nodes.bodyText: if tenant, device or contentType are {@code null}. Additionally: tenantId inside the tenant object may be null, which would be an error here. Maybe it would be a good idea to have a dedicated type for the (authenticated) device containing tenant-ID and device-ID as mandatory properties (additional to data from RegistrationAssertion you may need for your current task).

commit.message:
Remove dependency of hono-client-adapter on hono-client

Factored out common exception classes into new module hono-client-core.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

Require tenantId property being set

Signed-off-by:

Make health checks and lifecycle optional to implement

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

Make clients extend Lifecycle

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

Add missing serialVersionUUID

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

beforeCommit.message:
